content.detailedDescription: Did not see the object at the time, noticed it in a picture when reviewing at home.  at first i wrote it off at the sun, however it is in front of dark storm clouds and there is no yellow-orange glow anywhere else in the clouds and when you look closely you can see a arcing trail to the right of the object.  picture taken with a sony dslr a390 with a 75-300 mm lens.  we were on the locks over the rapids going from ontario to quebec and the camera was pointed to the se.
content.summary: Round yellow-orange circle surrounded by blue haze on stormy sky.

content.detailedDescription:
The sphere was spotted by my uncle, flying in an effortless motion in the night sky over the east coast of cape breton last night at 9:15. the light was quite large and was very different from the usual things spotted in our very dark sky's, such as stars, planes etc. it was traveling pretty fast on a scale of one to ten in speed, it was about a seven. it was traveling from north to south and before it was out of sight it seemed to blink off and disappeared. when he returned home there were messages on his answering machine from some family and friends, saying that they had seen something very odd in the sky. after speaking with them it was determined that they too had seen the same glowing object in the sky. 

i was contacted by my uncle, due to my knowledge and understanding of these phenomenons. i have spent the last 9 years researching and examining sightings.  

i have never made this story public but feel now is the time.

july 2001. sydney nova scotia.

2:30 in the morning. my best friend and i had just walked outside for a cigarette. we sat side by side on the curb and chatted for a few minutes, when we noticed a flash in the sky. we both looked up and seen something that to this day neither of us could explain. a massive ufo that span at least a mile in width. it was from my estimation, only 1000 feet off the ground and it lit up the sky. there were five massive lights on the object. each light approximately the size of a school bus. the lights flashed from both ends to the center. the light almost looked like a glowing fluid that moved in waves. we were shocked! it hoovered in one spot for at least 5 minutes. during this time my friend and i were trying to come up with an explanation for what we were seeing. there was only one explanation, a ufo. suddenly.... the object flew straight up into, what had to be space and hooked off in a westerly direction and disappeared into behind the star. we were both speechless. only after it was gone, did we realize that it had made no noise what so ever. to this day i feel haunted by what we seen and have become increasingly obsessed with finding the proof, that........... we are not alone.

*(wit's name deleted -- cms/sg).
content.summary: Greenish white light in the sky over sydney cape breton island

content.detailedDescription: Working on roof of 55 e52nd street ny ny taking shots of my coworkers with empire state building noticed the disc after loading it on pc
content.summary: No event took photos at work loaded to pc and then i saw it

content.detailedDescription: 11 or so ufo's flying far up. across the night sky. going all dirictions. dim but noticable.No satillites in sky on satillite tracker at the time.They were just crusin buy going about their bussness,just a lot of activity. they were round, white and gold in color. this was all seen from the look out point above the cliff house over the ocean in san francisco ca.
content.summary: About 11 ufos slowley but at a speed you can notice ,no satilits in sky on satilite tracker.

content.detailedDescription: Early afternoon i noticed some cool clouds so i grabbed my camera, headed out to the front yard and got four quick shots.  when i viewed them on the laptop a few moments later i noticed one had an odd mushroom shaped cloud that wasnt quite the same color as the other clouds.  i thought maybe it was a sonic boom so i perked up the midtones and put it on my website as a mystery. a few hours later i got to wondering, and after checking dozens of available pics online i found that the only ones that matched my shot were possible ufo's, not fighter jets.  since i didnt notice the object while i was outside i have no detailed info on its movements. one thing i found interesting was a purplish arc at the edge of the picture behind the object, it isnt on any other pics i have taken with that camera and doesnt strike me as flare.  had i taken the shot a fraction of a second later we may have seen something interesting trailing that craft.  attached 2 photos, one is the full shot with object circled in the lower right, the tones have been adjusted for best color but that is all that was done to that shot. one is a cropped and enlarged view of the object taken straight from the original picture, no touching up has been done on that shot.
content.summary: Mushroom captured on camera, complete surprise when i looked at the shot later.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside and saw 5 red lights about 70 degrees in elevation and to the southeast. they appeared to be about a few thousand feet in the air and hundred to a few hundred feet apart. four made a sort of square configuration and 1 was trailing behind. they did not seem connected. they were headed from the northeast towards the southwest. it was partly cloudy and the clouds were moving generally to the east. as the lights moved overhead i noticed an additional 3 trailing behind by a couple of hundred feet and separated a couple of hundred feet. i watched for about 5 minutes until they disappeared into the clouds. at there rate of speed it would take about 1 minute to cover ~90 degrees of sky. i then went inside for about 5 minutes and then back outside to see if there were more lights. there were 2 more lights, separated by about the same distance apart, and they also appeared to be coming from the northeast. at this point, i climbed to my roof to see if i could see any more approaching from the horizon. i could see a red light traveling above the rio grand river, ~ 5-10 miles away, but heading south. after watching for ~ 2min and this light disappearing, i waited for another 5 minutes and didn't see any more lights. i teach an astronomy lab at the university, so i am familiar with celestial objects and what conventional aircraft look like at night. these objects were silent, small, and very bright. the center of the light was a bright white - red, and seemed to glow solid red. i've never seen anything like it. i'm curios if anyone happened to video tape the objects or get a picture. please contact me if you have any questions
content.summary: Silent red lights over socorro nm

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the meteor showers and out no where the house right in front of me was lit up i looked and saw a large object off to the right of the house and about 50ft above the house it had red lights going down the side i flashed my flashlight on and off at it and it rotated to me and flashed me back with light like a equalizer the colors of the lights were red to white to purple i repeated it and it did it again so i went to the beach club where there was the lifegaurds were staying over night and asked them to look up and thats when i saw it was a triangle there was about 10 other people that saw the object other than me it went right over us no sound at all and it went out over the water and it just dropped down and vanished no sound of it hitting the water

note the house it was over was empty all summer until that night
 i know this because  i'm the security officer there the next day i meet the people that were staying at that house for the summer which i have never seen before that day i still had there beach pass which they never picked up i think what ever that object was it bought them back

note youtube type ri anomaly  the gaurd is me the people i'm talking to are the people that thing bough back the night before
content.summary: Youtube interview   ri anomoly

content.detailedDescription: saw a sphere like object that had an orange glow to it. this object was moving on a semi straight line from what appeared to be west to east. object would slow down shortly, then move back to its original speed. was moving for approximately 2 mins...... then disappeared from the sky. was witnessed by myself and my friend/co-worker. we both agreed that it looked like nothing we had ever seen before.
content.summary: Sphere like object, colored flame orange

content.detailedDescription:
The other night (15th) when i was out for my evening constitutional (about 10:20 pm), along the sarasota, florida waterfront i saw three orange lights. the night was overcast and particularly to the west. they were flying sw and then turned west away from sarasota (my residence) and flew into a bank of clouds. they were about three to four miles away and past the barrier island off the coast (my guess) and initially were under the cloud cover and easily visible. they were distinct and bright, brighter than any star. they appeared to be separate and only connected through proximity.
i saw no other lights associated with them. if they were planes, they were perhaps standing on their afterburners.
my question is, are afterburners orange? i always thought they were bluish
i am very familiar with airplanes and i have never seen this color associated with aircraft.
content.summary: Three apparently  separate orange lights with no blinking.

content.detailedDescription: I just got home from the store. i sat down on my porch and lite up a cigarette. the sky was very clear so i started to look at the stars. when i looked near the orion belt to find this strange looking star. it was more of a yellow color compaired to the other stars. at first i thought it was a star but noticed it moving. so i then thought it was just a plane, but i noticed all the other planes had the blinking lights and this one did not, it was also moving a lot slower than a plane. it started to move up into the atmosphere at a slow steady pace when all of a sudden it swirved to the right then back in its path. it continued to move up in the sky when i ran inside to get my boyfriend. when we came back out it was higher then when i left. i showed him and he saw it moving side to side then it stopped for a couple of seconds. when it started to move it was rotating in a circle in a clockwise direction then in a counter clockwise direction. the whole time still staying in one spot. it would continue to do this over and over for about 15 or 20 min. but in between it would move higher, every slowly just enough to notice it was moving. when it rotated in circle then stop and then move up, it would sometimes suddenly move side to side. i lost veiw of the object when it became to high in the sky to see. like i said bfore it was a clear night so i could see pretty far. i would describe myself as open mined but i am the kind of person that has to see to beleive. i saw and now i believe.
content.summary: High in the sky, thought it was a star but moved like a plane. zig-zaged slowly, fly up higher and higher then swirled

content.detailedDescription:
I observed a ufo hovering on the spot for aboout 2 minutes, with rotating lights on its belly. it caught my attention because it was not moving along (like the rest of the airplanes). this happened about 7:05 pm, jan 22, 2011.I reported it on facebook at 7:08, by which time it was gone.

it was a large craft, with lots of lights, but the rotating (white)lights on the belly were predominantly obvious. 

the shape of the ufo must have been round, since the rotating lights went round and about.

i was amazed that it hovered for so long. i ran to get my cellphone, took 3 pictures, but they didn't yield anything but darkness, eventhough i had gottan up on a ladder to get a higher position.

i ran inside to scramble for my photo camera, but in vain. when i got back out it was gone.

i wasn't afraid, or nervous, and there were no funny feelings. howerver, i was taken by surprise and i was amazed at its audacity to hover for so long! 

has anyone seen it? i would like to know.
content.summary: Disc shaped ufo with flashing rotating lights on belly near orlando airport, florida

content.detailedDescription: In my back yard there is apx. 300 or so feet of ground going strait back from my house, then a tree line about 60-80 ft. high.  i had my living room blind open, saw lights which i thought were at first an aircraft.  however, i noticed they were moving oddly; right to left, left to right, lights perfectly flat with the horizon, like running lights.  i called relatives to tell them something odd was out there.  i was scared but then looked again.  if the object's lights were spread out flat with the horizon before, then they tilted to one side (i forget which side), and moved side to side, left then right, right then left as before, only with one side tilted!  i closed the blinds then because i was upset.  this was at dark so i could only make out lights.  looked uniform like the running lights you would see on aircraft wings.  but the behavior was just odd!  i couldn't make out any forward movement (ie towards the house)!
content.summary: Brief sighting of lights, could possibly be explained, behavior odd however

content.detailedDescription: I have somehow been mentally communicated with, not with words but more like thoughts being put there and at one insistence saw something that looked like someone holding a light that suddenly vanished. when this incident occurred my sister brought to my attention a article she read of other people in my town having similar experiences. my mom also saw a ufo cigar shaped directly over our house and while all this was going on my sister who was in canada for a job project was experiencing all kinds of poltergeist activity which i also have experienced. at one point i was woken to a feeling of 2 beams on my body, one on my hand and the other some where near my stomach which i feel healed me because i was having pain in that hand which i no longer have. while all this was going on i was being followed around by real fancy cars and people, mostly men which seemed to follow me where ever i went. at one point i was chased by a white van. i have experienced dreams of seeing a ufo and feeling panic and hiding.  but i have also had a few experiences when i could actually feel a presence and a feeling of total peace and tranquility like they were some how doing something to me to make me feel a good feeling. i remember one missing time experience. during my child hood i had a experience where i had a thought to go out side and when i did i saw a large white light silently floating through the sky. because of these experiences i'm thinking about going under hypnosis and i'm also interested in meeting with others who have had similar experiences.
content.summary: Contact

content.detailedDescription:
Southern california, high noon, clear sky.  i was sitting on the beach with my dad between 11 am and noon on january 21, 2011.

while looking up and watching helicopters and commercial jets overhead, i noticed a white object far above the local traffic traveling from north to south at a rather slow pace.  odd, because air traffic here is going east/west most of the time. the exception is military craft going south/north/north/south at lower altitude and easily identified with the naked eye.  (this might not be totally accurate - just my general observation of traffic.)

i thought it might be an international airliner at high altitude traveling towards mexico or south america. it was certainly not a blimp, satellite, or anything else i could readily identify. i fetched a small pair of binoculars from my car and continued to track this object for about 10 minutes.

it appeared to be a white/shiny, short, cylinder-shaped object with no discernible wings or lights, and it moved in a straight line. all i was thinking was it must be very high up to appear to be moving so slowly.  as i was watching, the whole object flashed on and off a few times and then completely disappeared.

i continued to search the sky, wondering if i'd somehow lost sight of the object. as i tried to find it, it seemed to me there was some kind of cloud cover very high up. i asked my dad and he said the sky was clear.

so, what was it? how does a craft disappear in broad daylight and plain view?

and are there any other recorded sightings above san diego at this time?

still wondering!
content.summary: Spotted short cylinder object with eye, observed through binoculars, it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: While standing out back smoking i notice two bright lights off in the distance heading my direction. it took a few minutes to get close enough to make out what it was. after a couples more minutes i decided to run in and yell for my girlfriend to come look at it. stupid me never told her to grab the camcorder! she was so excited and kept talking asking what it was. i asked her shush and listen. i'm hard of hearing and could not hear any sound it was making. i asked her if she could hear anything and she stated " i hear a low humming sound. " at that point we walk to our side gate to see if we could get the neighbors to come out and look. they had a house full of people and couldn't hear me yell. the triangle was right over top of us. it was so big and bright and very low. i could have threw a rock and hit it. my girlfriend tried to get her cell phone camera to work and couldn't. she ran to the other side of the house to see if she could get the other neighbor to see it but she was leaving. we watched this thing for a good 15 minutes as it floated across the sky very slow from south east to north west. it was headed right toward the love's truck stop out to interstate 75. what i would say was the front of the thing had two lights like head lights. the under side had three lights in each corner. around those three lights were smaller lights. the smaller lights were in a circle around those three. across what i say was the back had two flashing lights. i'm sure someone else had to see this thing because it was to big and bright. i'm positive it was bigger than the lot our house is on.
content.summary: Triangle passes over our house very low. could have hit it with a rock. yelled for girl friend to confirm.

content.detailedDescription: Driveing home after droping someone off near sanford lake mi on the way back my nephew dring said what the **** i looked to the left from top of trees we seen a greenish blue object falling at a angle at a high rate of speed but not super fast that we couldnot get a detail .We seen for about 20 to 40 seconds the center of seemed brighter .Behind it left a trail of fireish sparks .Ive seen falling stars and comets this was strange it left us puzzeled .I would realy like to know what that was .I hear something was spotted like that nere detriot with hellecopters in following.It was heading approx. northeast when we lost site of the object.
content.summary: Greenish blue

content.detailedDescription:
At about 7:12pm on 01/21/2011 i was on my way to the store and i looked out the window toward the west and there were 6 possibly 7 red and then orange lights in the sky. my first thought was stars but the sun had gone down around 4 pm so it couldn't haven't been the sun lighting them up that color, and they slowly started to move. they started out in the formation of a constallation but then move into a line. some would fade in and out, but when they changed color from red to orange and back again they did it together. eventuly they all went from a straight line to a small circle and then dissappered. this all took pace within about 7mins. i think i was so amazed by my sighting that i didn't intirely pay attention to the time so for give me if my time is off but i know what i saw and all the thoughts put toward what they could have been were most trully false. 

hot air balloons with lights on them (no it was too windy to have that kind of control) air planes helicoptors (no way no noise and they dont have those colored lights) stealth plane (nope cuz they never once formed a triangle like some reports say)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 fireball-like lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was like a spinning top but the bottom not pointed, lots of multicolored lights.Lots of see through windows at top.At least 15 or 20 aliens unlike the standard look, they were half human and half standard look,full bodies,beautiful looking creatures all moving about and communicating what ever,all had the same light colored outfits and all the lights constantly moving,all windows seem to be moving or turning separatly from the bottom . the bottom then had a long yellow light dropping to the ground and a small stepside ford or chev pickup lowered slowly to the ground and disappeared over the hill ahead and ufo then disappeared and i followed to find it and could not find.But at the bottom of the hill daylight stunned me and it was 630 am.I dont know where the night went.The man in the pickup i never did find and thats my story,i was driving for ffe trucking out of denver colorado.The lady in the sleeper or secong driver was asleep then awoke and told me to turn that dam xx cken light off daxxxmmt.I said i didnt turn it on.Ipulled over to some restaurant i dont remember,i donot have any photosbut i also dont know how to put a drawing in to show you but i can draw what i saw.For someone and since then i have people ive never seen seem to follow me and when i look to notice i dont see them anymore. the reason i havent told anyone is because its just another back then ,something nice to read but not believable.The last sighting was by carr colorado.3 cigar shaped ufos foating high above us at about 4 or 5 pm on cold partly cloudy day.We all looked at each other and passed it off,took a left turn onto highway 85 and headed home to greeley and kingsburg back to the oil rig.
content.summary: Top of hill pointed west infront  and abovelots of windows and aliens

content.detailedDescription: We had just gotten home from a movie and i went to walk the dog. being a clear sky, i was admiring the cosmos, like i always do. i started seeing several,"traveling stars", or starlike ufos. i took the dog in and grabbed my wife. she watched, for a few seconds, got cold and went back inside. i had told our neighbors across the street that the next time i see multipel strange lights, i would come get them. i took of across the road and glanced to the west. i then observed the big starlike object coming directly toward their house. i opened the door and yelled for them to hurry out. at this time, the object was almost, directly overhead. we all watched it go overhead and over the next door neighbors house. i then dimmed from, an almost blinding light, to suddenly an amber color then totally disappered. this thing was the the size of the full moon.
content.summary: Walking across the street to the neighbors, looked up, and saw a huge starlike object coming from the west.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work (state route 20 mile post 196, looking northwest), it was dark and clear, various stars were out with a full moon.  i drove around a bend in the highway and saw all of these stars in the sky, one was brighter then the rest almost like a planet, then it winked out like someone turned off a switch. i asked my wife, "did you see that?" and she said "what?", and i told her a star had just winked out, she said "really?".  i told her it was just there now it's gone.  i tried looking at the stars to see more but with the slick roads and deer i just drove on. i thought to myself "did i really see that?", but i had, i knew i did.
content.summary: Star winks out

content.detailedDescription:
There are 3 more videos that accompany this one. search you tube for "ufo in hd" and you can see more angles of the craft. read the descriptions for each video for details. *best spot on this video attached is at around 1:58 and you will clearly see it is a silver disk rotating when i zoomed in. then you can clearly see some type of weird electromagnetic camouflage come over the object.  this obscures it..And shields it from view. from a distance...It looks just like a venus or a star, but the flashing was undeniably strange and you would notice it right away.
background/update...I woke up and always check the sky for venus. (it is up at an angle i have to strain my neck to see it at a high angle off the horizon...Way up there), from the window and i position i am at...It is almost out of view...On a consistent basis. out of nowhere...I took a glance out the window, and saw a pretty big object that was flashing and seemingly pulsating...Then i swear to you...It started to move...Slowly...Nothing drastic.  i ran down the hall and grabbed 2 camcorders and 2 tripods...This is one of the original clips.  i starting filming at 5:11 am on sunday january 16th, 2011.  it was off the horizon at around a 70 degree angle, not up high where venus is, but i would estimate about sears tower altitude on it.  the ufo was lower than venus and in a completely different area.  i would say it was hanging right over the norridge or harwood heights areas. as it was finally clear here in chicago...(today 1/21/2011), i checked the sky...Same time today...Nothing was in this area...At all. nothing. saw venus...Same spot...Way up...You can see it but barely. venus does not change positions like that. this object (on video and i attached a photo) was only there on dec. 15th and jan. 16th. (i have 94 minutes of footage...Including the departure of the craft and i will send a copy of both dvd's to mufon) (i tried as hard as possible to keep quiet and keep the camera steady, but i lost it a few times, and so parental guidance is suggested i say a few bad words...Could not help reacting...I lost it a few times.)
content.summary: Ufo in hd video attached:  (search you tube for ufo in hd)

content.detailedDescription: Ironically, leaving the mufon dr. roger leir presentation at the unitarian church parking lot in parking lot and seeing the teardrop ufo. i was just getting into my car and i saw it come down right behind the church into the tree line. it was very bright and colorful about the size of a car and exactly shaped like a tear drop. there was no sound or noise and the colors were very bright. my girlfriend happened to be outside the car standing waiting for me to back the car out and looking at the exact direction also. we could not believe what we saw. i noticed the object because it was night time and it came down before our eyes with it's large size, colors, and shape...Hard not to notice.
content.summary: Ironically, leaving mufons dr. roger leir's presentation at the unitarian church parking lot in parking lot  and seeing the teardrop ufo.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were returning home from dinner around 7:45 in the evening of january 20th.  we were traveling on texas hiway 6 just south of i-20.  we were observing the beautiful moon rising in the east that looked as large as the sun and was a golden orange color as well.  beautiful moon, so our eyes were toward the sky.  i turned my head to the south again and out of the corner of my eye i saw a bright oranage orb out the passenger side of the truck about 35 degrees above the horizon.  i thought it was a star at first and then it went out.  i told my husband i thought i saw that ufo again.  (incidently. we had seen some before on march 23rd, 2010 reported on this sight. please see artist depiction of that particular sighting around that date) suddenly the orb appeared again.  we turned off the road thru a gate and saw it go out.  we stopped and watched for about 10 miniutes and observed again this time one, two three four five come on all in a row and stay steady for about 5-10 seconds then they all went out at the same time.  as we watched the dark sky we saw some tiny bright white lights appear breifly here and there around where the orbs appeared.  the in a few minutes we saw one large one to the west appearing to be toward the direction of cisco or maybe about 7 miles south of cisco.  i told my husband that i thought that was the star that hangs out over there all the time, but just as i said that it went out!  we continued to watch directly to the south and the string of orbs appeared again in sequence, one, two, three, four, five and stay on just briefly and then went out.  we saw the little bright white lights again briefly around where the string had appeared.  we came on into the drive and parked the truck and got out and continued to observe for about 5 more minutes single orange orbs appear here and there.  like i said this is the second time we have seen this string of orange orbs in this area appearing to be just over the city of carbon, tx.  we continued to watch but didn't see anymore for a good while and as it was very cold outside we went inside around 8:10 pm.  unfortunately, we had no camera but we did observe cars stopped on the side of the highway watching as well so maybe they will report their sighting as well and maybe have a photo.
content.summary: Multiple orange orbs in the sky accompanied by small bright white lights

content.detailedDescription: At exactly 11:24 am on 1/20/11 i was driving, and was traveling east at the intersection of broadway & east 2nd ave in el cajon, ca in san diego county.  i noticed 3 peculiar oval, circle, or spherical objects due east. i pulled into the cvs parking lot at the intersection as i was driving my work truck, to observe the objects. they looked like they were hovering just above or behind the mountains, and they were spaced the same distance apart from each other in a line and were not changing altitude or speed or distance.  it was a very clear sky today, about 75 degrees and the sky was so blue, not a cloud in that area, that they stcuk out like a sore thumb.  they weren't huge, but if someone were to see them, they definitley would have stuck out.  i thought they might be planes at first, but i could see planes taking off and landing to the north of me at the airport.  these objects were not in the airports flight line, and even when helicopters are far away, i can see the rotors, and i've never seen silver helicopters moving that slowy, in synchrnization or commercial or private planes. except for military planes flying in tandem, but at such slow speeds?  at the same time i saw a single engine plane to the ese of me, but in front of another mountain, at roughly the same distance, flying in front of the other mountain.  an analogie for how slow the objects were moving to the plane in front of the mountain, would be to compare 3 people walking in slow motion to a person running.  i watched them for 10 minutes and they disappeared behind the mountain.  i was in the navy, and i'm aware san diego has a lot of military activity, but these were something i couldn't explain.  after i left the area, i was traveling west on highway 8 when to the north i noticed what looked like an f-18 moving extremley fast at about 2,000 ft altitude, in the direction i saw the objects.  that was about 10-15 minutes after i had left the parking lot watching the objects.
content.summary: 3 balls moving very slowly,  no change in direction or speed.

content.detailedDescription: I am seeing a blue light from my bedroom window a blue light flashing realy fast. for the last 45 to 50 minuts. and its over the air bass in wichita ks,
content.summary: A blue light flashing realy fast over the air bass.

content.detailedDescription: I remember it was a sunny, summer day. blue skies and warm. it was a saturday, and myself, my husband and 13yr old son were running errands, and i think we ate lunch prior to this also. we were stopped at the intersection on redwood road and 9800 south at the stop light. the all of a sudden we heard a loud boom in the car!! our windows were rolled up, and we don't think it was a car backfire at all. it sounded like a shotgun went off inside of the car. i started shaking and tried to turn to see if my son was ok in the back seat. i was disoriented, so were they. my husband was checking himself for blod on his shirt and so was my son. i looked down at myself also, but i was frieghtened that i would see blood. it was like a jolt hit us or something. i finally said "is everyone ok?" my son replied, " yea mom i'm ok". we were all ok. the light turned green and we started to go finally. no one around us was affected, by that i mean others in cars around us. we were all saying what the heck was that? it was very strange and weird. my son felt like maybe we were hit by a time warp and got put back or something. it took me an hour to calm down from shaking and being scared. i still won't drive around that area at all. we have had other sightings and strange things happen to us. but that day still frightens me a lot!! the lady from idaho's comments from today made me remeber this.
content.summary: Heard a loud boom, then possible time warp?

content.detailedDescription: I was going to get something downstairs and as i passed the window i saw a blue orb.  didnt think much of it till i saw it move.  it was also the color that made me notice it as it was a dim blue.  i couldnt understand why a flying aircraft wouldn't have a brighter light on it. i thought this was strange so i went to my room and grabbed my camera and then proceeded to my deck to record it on film. it went back and forth then descended.  it could be a helicopter in movement but there was no sound.  helicopters fly around all the time but you hear them quite clearly and this object was only 40 blocks from me. i would like to know what it was even if its just something explainable.  do helicoptors all have blinking strobs so that other craft can see it?  this craft was just one blue light with no sound.  i have the footage.
content.summary: Saw the object from my deck as a blue orb.

content.detailedDescription: i was on my way to the pharmacy after dinnertime in the early evening, and i noticed while i was driving, that there was something strange reflecting on my windshield, so i stopped to verify what was happening. i stepped out of my car and saw in the sky below the level of aircraft which were flying way above, were not a reflection at all but a very wonderous sight, it was raining, the sky was dark and grey but the `thing in the sky was clearly observable,hard to describe in one word, there were four small craft veiled in a fuzzy cloud of light they were turning counterclockwise at the same time and then instantly met in the center where they formed a large ball of light. they then repositioned back into the circles edge at 90 degree intervals,turned counterclockwise for which appeared to be of the same distance as the time before, it seemed as though they recentered every 90 degrees of rotation. when i reached the pharmacy it continued to hover at the same height, ther were only a few people in the parking lot, they did not look up into the sky even though i was standing ther and staring at it. i didn`t feel right about calling attention to it, i said i will wait and see if anyone else notices before i speak up, unfortunately no one caught on at the pharmacy so i continued back home all the while keeping my eye on this thing, finally i see two teenagers waliking their dogs on the sidewalk staring up in the sky, i stop my car and ask them if they see what i am seeing, they said yes, i was very relieved to know i was not seeing things. i asked them if they had a camara, they said yes, and they said they tried to take a picture with their cell phone camera, but it was not showing up well. i told them they should try to film it and put it on you tube or something. i got home and felt very helpless. i wish i had taken greater measures and have invested in a disposable at the pharmacy, i felt negligent. from now on i keep that old cell phone charged in case i do see this thing again. i have roamed the internet since and have been checking for similar sightings, to my amazement i discovered something extremely similar in an ohio sighting on may 16,2010. this is why i have decided to come forward and describe my sighting in a public forum. thank you for this website
content.summary: 4 small blurry crafts rotated counterclockwise in sychronicity and then joined at the center , rotated and then centred again constantly while moving horizontaly over land . it was below the level of aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the beach at nokomis park on the gulf of mexico at first dark. this is on casey key south of sarasota by about 15 miles. i was looking at the stars and noticed a star that seemed to change intensity and slightly shifted spectral color. there were no clouds present to distort the view. moon was at full and a breeze from the gulf at maybe 5 knots. as i continued to look at this star and the surrounding sky the "star" blinked out.  i was a bit surprised as i never mistook it for anything other than a star. i have been working in aviation for 31 years and have seen just about every type of aircraft you can imagine. what this was i am uncertain of. i can tell you it never moved laterally or changed altitude. it was not a jet or a helicopter. there was no noise or contrail. i could not tell you what the altitude would have been as again it appeared to be a star at first. i was quite taken aback so i continued to watch the area where it had been for several minutes but it did not reappear.
content.summary: Star like object. modulating intensity then blinked out.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog outside to do her business. i always watch the night sky because i have seen other suspect objects. but i have never seen anything like this. i saw a bright orange light that looked like a fireball. i got my sister to see this, and she got my neighbor and my 3 year old nephew came out. it dulled and became less intense. then it started moving and separated into 2 orange/yellow spheres. 1 started going off to the left and the other flew directly over us. when it was above us it went from being a glowing orb to a saucer looking object with many lights. it was very low but silent. after watching them for a little bit it looked as if they were flying parallel to each other. when they crossed the entire sky they flew high up. the one that flew over us turned around and passed over us again and the other one flew off into the distance. we notice many other objects in the sky. not sure if they were some sort of ufo or planes. but there were many moving lights. the one we paid most attention to was the one that flew over us and turned around, after it passed over again it turned yellow again. and my dog was getting annoying so i took it inside. came back out shortly and saw another craft that looked similar to what we had saw earlier. then turned yellow and looked like it ascended into the sky and just looked like a yellow star from that point on. and in another part of the sky i saw a bright red light. i watched it for a few seconds then it got really bright and disappeared and i didnt see it again.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Fireball in sky then turns into crafts and cross the sky.
